File libsrc/libmath/LogData.c

Public Functions

LogData 
 void LogData(int n,
              float *y)
Convert data to log10. Convert the input float array y[] to log10(y[]). All elements y[i] that are less than or equal to zero are set to the log of the minimum y[i] that is greater than 0.
